mapper.select: SELECT A.ialbum, A.album_title AS albumTitle, B.album_pic AS albumPic FROM t_album A LEFT JOIN t_album_pics B ON A.ialbum = B.ialbum GROUP BY A.ialbum ORDER BY A.ialbum DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
SELECT ialbum, album_comment AS albumComment, created_at AS createdAt, iteacher, iparent FROM t_album_comment WHERE ialbum = #{ialbum} ORDER BY createdAt ASC
mapper.delete:
DELETE B, C FROM t_album A LEFT JOIN t_album_comment B ON A.ialbum = B.ialbum LEFT JOIN t_album_pics C ON A.ialbum = C.ialbum WHERE A.ialbum = #{ialbum}
and A.iteacher = #{iteacher}
